law.catch_line: A person who violates any provision of § 21-301 of this title or § 21-401 of this subtitle is guil...
law.text: A person who violates any provision of § 21-301 of this title or § 21-401 of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $5,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 2 years or both.
